description: Calling non-Apply values and assigning through Index-only values surface Apply/IndexMut diagnostics

typecheckDiagnostics: typechecker: v12/fixtures/ast/interfaces/apply_index_missing_impls/source.able:23:3 typechecker: cannot call non-callable value ReadOnlyPair (missing Apply implementation)
typechecker: v12/fixtures/ast/interfaces/apply_index_missing_impls/source.able:27:3 typechecker: cannot assign via [] without IndexMut implementation on type Index i32 i32
